doc:
Sue Bond https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sue_Bond 0 Sue Bond (born 9 May 1945) is a British actress, cabaret singer and comedian best remembered for her appearances on The Benny Hill Show in the early 1970s. She appeared with Benny Hill for three years between 1970 and 1973, making her one of the longest serving female cast members of the pre-Hill's Angels era. In the mid-1970s Bond appeared increasingly in sitcoms. Alongside of her acting, Bond had a second career as a singer, mainly on the Northern Club Circuit. Her last acting credit to date was in the short-lived revival of Mind Your Language in 1986, but she continued singing on the cabaret circuit into the early 1990s. Sue_Bond ( born_9_May_1945 ) is a_British_actress , cabaret_singer and comedian_best remembered for her_appearances on The_Benny_Hill_Show in the_early_1970s . She appeared with Benny_Hill for three_years between 1970_and_1973 , making her_one of the_longest_serving_female_cast_members of the_pre-Hill 's_Angels_era . In the_mid-1970s_Bond appeared increasingly in sitcoms . Alongside of her_acting , Bond had a_second_career as a_singer , mainly on the_Northern_Club_Circuit . Her_last_acting_credit to date was in the_short-lived_revival of Mind Your_Language in 1986 , but she continued singing on the_cabaret_circuit into the_early_1990s .
